StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_O.cerSelec.onBoardDetails]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN
SELECT B.FRIENDLY_NAME ,RO_DIST.SHORT_NAME ,P.LAST_NAME ,P.FIRST_NAME ,LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1) AS MI ,RIGHT(P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, 4) AS LAST4 ,P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN ,P.SUFFIX_CD ,MC.GENDER_CODE AS GEN ,CASE WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0C','1C') THEN 'AIR' WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0B','1B') THEN 'GROUND' WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0E','1A') THEN 'LAW' WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('0A','1H') THEN 'NFO' WHEN N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE IN ('1E') THEN 'RESERVE' END AS PROGRAM ,OBS.DESCRIPTION ,CASE WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ')) THEN 'W' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') ) THEN 'AA' WHEN (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 'H' ELSE 'O' END AS ETH ,REC.LAST_NAME AS OSO ,ISNULL(PG.RANK_CODE, ' ') + ' ' + ISNULL(S.SERVICE, ' ') AS PR_SVC ,OAI.CONTRACT_GPA ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_LSAT_SCORE ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_SAT_SCORE ,OAI.PROFESSED_EXAM_ACT_SCORE ,OAI.LAST_PFT_SCORE FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN OFFICER_BOARD_STATUS OBS ON OBS.BOARD_STATUS_ID = OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS_OLAP..OFFICER_APPLICANT_INTEGRATED OAI ON N.NWA_ID = OAI.APPLICANT_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP RS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP DIST ON RS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP REG ON DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = REG.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP MCRC ON REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = MCRC.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_DIST ON DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_REG ON REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_REG.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_MCRC ON MCRC.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO_MCRC.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN PERSON REC ON N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = REC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MARINE M ON M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE CPS ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPS.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID and CPS.UPDATE_DATE in (SELECT MAX(CPS2.UPDATE_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE CPS2 WHERE MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPS2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SERVICE S ON CPS.SERVICE_ID = S.SERVICE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY_GRADE PG ON PG.PAY_GRADE_CODE = M.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON N.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 END
